trans-unit.source: Azure RemoteApp best practices
trans-unit.target: Azure RemoteApp best practices

trans-unit.source: Best practices for configuring and using Azure RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: Best practices for configuring and using Azure RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: Best practices for configuring and using Azure RemoteApp
trans-unit.target: Best practices for configuring and using Azure RemoteApp

trans-unit.source: The following information can help you configure and use Azure RemoteApp productively.
trans-unit.target: The following information can help you configure and use Azure RemoteApp productively.

trans-unit.source: Connectivity
trans-unit.target: Connectivity

trans-unit.source: Always use the latest client version.
trans-unit.target: Always use the latest client version.

trans-unit.source: Using older clients might result in connectivity issues and other degraded experiences.
trans-unit.target: Using older clients might result in connectivity issues and other degraded experiences.

trans-unit.source: Enabling automatic application updates for your device will ensure that the latest client is always installed.
trans-unit.target: Enabling automatic application updates for your device will ensure that the latest client is always installed.

trans-unit.source: Always use the most stable and reliable internet connection available to you.
trans-unit.target: Always use the most stable and reliable internet connection available to you.

trans-unit.source: Use only supported proxy connections for optimal connectivity performance.
trans-unit.target: Use only supported proxy connections for optimal connectivity performance.

trans-unit.source: The SOCKS proxy is not supported.
trans-unit.target: The SOCKS proxy is not supported.

trans-unit.source: Applications
trans-unit.target: Applications

trans-unit.source: Save and close RemoteApp applications when you are done with the application.
trans-unit.target: Save and close RemoteApp applications when you are done with the application.

trans-unit.source: Not closing the application might result in data loss.
trans-unit.target: Not closing the application might result in data loss.

trans-unit.source: Validate custom applications before using them in Azure RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: Validate custom applications before using them in Azure RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: This includes ensuring they work on a multi-session platform and don’t consume unnecessary resources such as memory and CPU that might starve another user in the same collection.
trans-unit.target: This includes ensuring they work on a multi-session platform and don’t consume unnecessary resources such as memory and CPU that might starve another user in the same collection.

trans-unit.source: For information, download and review the [Application Compatibility Best Practices for Remote Desktop Services](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=18704).
trans-unit.target: For information, download and review the [Application Compatibility Best Practices for Remote Desktop Services](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=18704).

trans-unit.source: Configuration and management
trans-unit.target: Configuration and management

trans-unit.source: Keep your template images up to date, installing software updates and other critical fixes as needed.
trans-unit.target: Keep your template images up to date, installing software updates and other critical fixes as needed.

trans-unit.source: This ensures that as Azure RemoteApp auto-scales to meet your capacity, each instance is patched.
trans-unit.target: This ensures that as Azure RemoteApp auto-scales to meet your capacity, each instance is patched.

trans-unit.source: Make sure your Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) deployment is secure and reliable.
trans-unit.target: Make sure your Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) deployment is secure and reliable.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise client authentications might fail, preventing users from accessing Azure RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise client authentications might fail, preventing users from accessing Azure RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: Configure template images with installed applications, roles, or features such that they are stateless.
trans-unit.target: Configure template images with installed applications, roles, or features such that they are stateless.

trans-unit.source: They should not rely on any instances of the virtual machines in a RemoteApp service being in a persistent state.
trans-unit.target: They should not rely on any instances of the virtual machines in a RemoteApp service being in a persistent state.

trans-unit.source: Store all user data in user profiles or other storage locations external to the service, such as on-premises file shares or OneDrive.
trans-unit.target: Store all user data in user profiles or other storage locations external to the service, such as on-premises file shares or OneDrive.

trans-unit.source: Store shared data in storage locations external to the service, such as on-premises file shares or OneDrive.
trans-unit.target: Store shared data in storage locations external to the service, such as on-premises file shares or OneDrive.

trans-unit.source: Configure any system-wide settings in the template image rather than on individual virtual machines in a service.
trans-unit.target: Configure any system-wide settings in the template image rather than on individual virtual machines in a service.

trans-unit.source: Disable automatic software updates for published applications - instead apply them manually to the template image and test them before you deploy from the template.
trans-unit.target: Disable automatic software updates for published applications - instead apply them manually to the template image and test them before you deploy from the template.
